updated_at.description: last updated at timestamp in seconds(ç§’)

mode_type.description:
* AllDay - this class will last for 24 hours for the whole day 
 * Repeat - repeat it daily/weekly/monthly/yearly

repeat.description: repeat options, only work when mode_type equal Repeat,

interval.description: interval years (less or equal than 2 years)

due_at.description: If I schedule the time as homework or task, then I should be able to set a due date. This is optional for me. The due date cannot be earlier than class end time.
